[[File:TinkeringFlag.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
[[Tinkering]] is a skill that allows you to craft tools, traps and other useful items. It's paired well with any other crafting skill considering you can craft the tools you will be using along the way. Miners can create more pickaxes or blacksmiths can create more hammers for example. Tinkers may also craft jewelry, although, this is considered useless since there is no craftable magic jewelry.

In the [[Naval Warfare Reborn]] expansion, a few items were added to the [[Tinkering]] to upgrade ships as well as materials to use with ships. 

Tinkers usually use [[Ingots]] but also can use [[wood]] for some items.

[[Power Scrolls]] and [[Skill Scroll]]s are available for this skill.

==Usage==
By double clicking Tinker tools or a Tinkers Kit you get to the [[Tinkering]] menu where you can select the Tools or Items you want to make, view the success chance, ingredients needed, and minimal Tinkering skill to attempt making the item. If you have below the level needed, it will tell you that youâ€™re not skilled enough to try.

==Militia Traps==
If your Tinker is a member of Militia, you have the ability to craft Militia Traps.

{| class="wikitable"
! Trap
! Description
|-
| Faction Gas Trap
| The gas trap will poison players who walk across it.
|-
| Faction Explosion Trap
| The explosion trap deals a moderate amount of Fire damage to players who walk across it.
|-
| Faction Saw Trap
| The saw trap will cause a moderate amount of physical damage to players who trigger it.
|-
| Faction Spike Trap
| The Spike trap will harm players who walk atop it with a modest physical impediment.
|}

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-50: Buy from NPC
:50-90: Lockpicks
:90-100: Spyglasses or Lockpicks
